title: Twitter : most popular tweets as of February 2020
summary: In 2020 , Yusaku_Maezawa:_offering_1M_yen_each_to_100_randomly_selected_people_who_retweeted_the_message_and_followed_him_(Jan_'19) was the most Yusaku_Maezawa:_giveaway_with_1bn_yen_being_promises_to_1000_people_(Dec_'19) with the highest Number in the tweets , with a total Number of 4.2 million El_Rubius:_LIMONADA_2.0_(Sep_'18) retweets .

data.Popular Tweet: Yusaku Maezawa: offering 1M yen each to 100 randomly selected people who retweeted the message and followed him (Jan '19)
Yusaku Maezawa: giveaway with 1bn yen being promises to 1000 people (Dec '19)

Louis Tomlinson: Always in my heart @Harry Styles . Yours sincerely Louis (Oct '11)

gold: This statistic presents the most retweeted Twitter posts of all time . The most re-tweeted tweet of all time was posted by Japanese billionaire Yusaku Maezawa on January 5 , 2019 . The entrepreneur offered one million yen each to 100 randomly selected people who retweeted the message and followed his account .
